About me

About Me

I'm Michael, a software engineer with experience in Ruby on Rails, Javascript, React/Redux, and a background in finance. I love seeing things from a different perspective. I seek to bring the technical and creative together to build delightful, intuitive experiences. I've worked in various roles, but I most enjoy building and learning something new.
